pullRequest.title: 1614: Adding Financial Year Duration Option
pullRequest.bodyText: This fixes #1614 and fixes #1615 (nullifying the main reason for it) by adding a financial year duration option, which was actually mentioned in the code as a future improvement for finances. I've also modified my previous financial PR #1621's code (implementing #1613) to instead be based on the financial year duration (mostly just a rename of variables and localization rework).

commit.message: Adding new code for displaying levelled tooltips
Adding financial Year duration option properly
Switching to DefaultListCellRenderer to fix issue for java 8

nodes.bodyText:

            FinancialYearDuration.ANNUAL.toolTipText=The financial year lasts one year

nodes.bodyText: Do we really want to give this option? Some people run units from the Star League to the Succession Wars.
